name: My lil' Sleipnir
description:
A demo for a game our team created for a class in Reykjavík University.

Controls:

Up arrow key - Jump (Hold for higher jump)

Up arrow key (in air) - Double jump (if active)

Down arrow key - Ground slam (if active)

Left arrow key - Slow down

Right arrow key - Speed up

P - Pause (during run)

Google form:

https://forms.gle/jueAgjk6rqBasWab7
